content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a newly built, unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The conversation ended with an offer from Max Müller of 700 Euro per month, which I found to be more in line with what I had anticipated as a starting point for negotiation. We agreed to continue discussing details, but no final price was set.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As Peter Schmidt, I would rate Max Müller's likeability as a negotiation partner as a 7. He was straightforward, flexible, and willing to negotiate, which are all qualities that I appreciate in a partner. However, his initial offer was quite low, reflecting his status as a student and potentially indicating that he may require additional guidance or compromise to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Max Müller approached the conversation professionally and respectfully, and his status as a student did not impact the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
